item.title: VBA IV: Free Cash Flow
item.description: Highly automated sheet developed during college. Based on a case study about the economical viability of a landfill construction. This sheet includes all steps from choosing the landfill location, financing of pre-implementation phase and creation of Free Cash Flow for actionists on different scenarios. Content in portuguese. Available at: Google Drive Objective: Create an automated MPS System Functionalities: Allows multiples datasets Positive, Pessimist and Realist scenarios Automatic Financing, Payback, VPL, TIR and MTIR calculation.
